author: Anita Kumar
title: Trump allies jump in to help organize lockdown protests
description: As the events have become more widespread, they have also become more organized and partisan as national groups get involved.
content: Hes very much into polls numbers and ratings, said Jim Hodges, a former Democratic governor of South Carolina. I imagine it infuriates him that hes the polar opposite of governors. Theyre getting good marks and his are the polar opposite. Thats the sort of st… [+4930 chars]
